name: Steam Dragon
description:
This is my prototype example entry for Bullet Bash.

https://itch.io/jam/bullet-bash

Because I hosted the jam and will be judging the other entries, this entry will not receive any award, but feel free to try out what I have so far (:

Controls:

Arrows - Move

Z - Shoot

Shift - Speed up

F4 - Adjust window size

Hit box = Black square
